website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one set that includes a wok, lid, and silicone handles for easier, safer, more convenient cooking and food storage.
pros: Already seasoned, so ready to use after a quick hand washing
Versatile – can be used on just about any cooking surface, including a grill or in an oven
Two side handles and silicone grips make it easy to safety remove from the heat or transfer food
Lid keeps food warm longer after cooking is complete, and contains splatter
Comes with gift box, recipes, and a 30-day warranty
cons: Some reported it arrived with items missing or that the lid did not fit properly, and customer care is questionable

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This wok is really great. It’s giant and heavy. Exactly what I was looking for. The little red silicone heat protector handles aren’t perfect because they do not actually fasten to the handle, they just kind of loosely sit on the handle, but they serve their purpose. Love this thing!!! It’s preseason Ed so you don’t have to do the whole salt and oil and oven thing but I did anyway because it’s kind of fun, right? Remember to dry it immediately after washing it because cast iron is prone to rusting. Also remember to coat it in a little bit of vegetable or canola oil after washing it. I highly recommend this wok.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Items!
customer_reviews.text: The wok itself is fine, but there was no glass lid shipped with it. Description shows the glass lid is included, and in the box was the handle for the lid, and the screw to hold it in place. I sent a message to maker the day after Christmas, and I have heard nothing from them in two weeks now. Glass lid important for steaming, and I would like to get it, but I may have to find one on my own...ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wm Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wok so much. It's heavy, sturdy, well made and has changed the way I cook, especially vegetables. This has helped improve my veggie/stir fry game. My kids (8&10) have asked for seconds in veggies ever since I started cooking with it. I can't say enough about it. One of the best purchases I've made in a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Markita R.

customer_reviews.title: Even heat fast cooking
customer_reviews.text: Best wok I’ve ever had. Fast even heat. Heavy and durable. Just fantastic. If you’re a cook and like heavy duty cookware this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Steele

customer_reviews.title: nice wok, great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this wok! Bottom has a little bit flatter center than my Lodge wok but still works great for cooking stir fry or fried rice. Great value since it comes with a lid and silicon pads for handles so fingers don't get cooked! Wiped out easily after use.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: I like it okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s very bumpy. I love having a wok, but I dislike that it’s not very deep. This one is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marni Conaway

customer_reviews.title: BEST WOK YET,NICE COVER TOO
customer_reviews.text: well it is heavy but it is awesome, easy to wipe clean, gave it a little cure and made some real great egg foo young ,love it it is smooth enough to go on my glass top electric stove an wide enough,very little stove clean up,best wok yet
customer_reviews.author: Shmendric M.

customer_reviews.title: Can't miss Asian Cooking
customer_reviews.text: This wok keeps the necessary heat to cook Asian. Everything tastes Great!
customer_reviews.author: Howard Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Black little dot off from the wok when you are cooking and cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: It should not earn even one star!!! Do not waste your money to buy the trash. I find the "black things" on picture is off when you cooking and cleaning day by day ( I bought on Oct 11, 2019)! I don't know how much me and my family eat with the food with that wok cooking! I can not return I already used for cooking! So angry to waste the money buy the cooking ware that may harm your health!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. The only thing to give 3 star is the wok turn rusty after every wash and I have to put oil after washing it.
customer_reviews.author: pstha

customer_reviews.title: What a great dollar value!
customer_reviews.text: If you do not have a gas stove, this is the Wok for you. I gave it as a Christmas gift this year. My friend has used it three times already. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ibladyc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for cooking
customer_reviews.text: Best cooking product I’ve ever used it doesn’t stick seasons my food beautifully!! A definite recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Talk shop

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I loooooovvvveeee my wok. Its perfect for the variety of cooking i do, from stir frys to soups. Super easy to clean and just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: katie deacon

customer_reviews.title: Huge and for great price
customer_reviews.text: Gift for husband. He only uses this now, he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Dlee16

customer_reviews.title: Not great for induction cooktops
customer_reviews.text: Not so great for induction cooktops. Probably works great with a gas range.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Holland

customer_reviews.title: Re...spect....wok
customer_reviews.text: I used this for four days in a row after it arrived. Best fried rice and stir fry ever. It's easy to clean and a good size. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah k. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and she loves it. It lives on the stove now lol.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: MY WOK
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this wok. I love cooking and this will be my go to. Thank you for this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory-lornell: H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pan!
customer_reviews.text: It's one of my treasures! Even comes with 'cool' handles. Cooks food beautifully, as a wok was intended to do. The only negative is that it's really, REALLY heavy. But that's also what you get when you get a cast iron pan. Good quality. Not easy to clean, basically because of its weight. But, once done, re-season with some oil dipped in a paper towel and be sure to put somewhere DRY, so rust spots don't show up.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jeff and Sharyn Stone

customer_reviews.title: Solid wok for a solid price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good wok, well constructed and pre-seasoned so you can start cooking right out of the box. As with any wok some attention to proper cleaning and maintenance will do you well but these things can be basically indestructible, and I haven't yet come across a story of a wok too far-gone to be made ready again.
customer_reviews.author: NeilS

customer_reviews.title: Thi is an awesome wok!
customer_reviews.text: Other then the weight and not having a regular handle this is an awesome product. It worked well for making stir fried Pepper steak and I can wait to explore more recipes with it! But it is cast iron and I expected it to be heavy but it might be combersome for someone who is older or smaller. If it had a regular handle to grip it might be less cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: TinyTim

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I received this wok today. The lid does not fit. The silicon handles did NOT come with it as the description indicated. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McConnell

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this wok
customer_reviews.text: I took my time and seasoned my new wok when I first received this and I love this wok. This will be the last wok I will ever have to buy again. I use it to make a wide variety of meals. You can't go wrong with this wok.
customer_reviews.author: susan todd

customer_reviews.title: Not well seasoned
customer_reviews.text: I’m Asia use cast iron wok all the time. I only used this wok once the seasoned coat is gone already. Super stick hard to wash. Don’t wanna deal with the returning after I used already. Won’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MKearney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I cook a lot, so for me it’s very important to have good cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Dinara Locmele

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Is great cast iron but not to heavy. I have had cast iron cookware for about 45 yrs. Unfortunately time has caught up and I can't use them all the time. I love this one and so does my husband
customer_reviews.author: Gideb

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Wok!  Food sticks like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: Hated this wok!! Food stuck so bad the first time we used it we need another scraper. Absolutely terrible!!! Rough finish.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don't  over clean cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: Cast iron that is season is amazing to cook with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 14-Inch Cast Iron Wok Set (Pre-Seasoned), Glass Lid & Silicone Hot Handle Holders
product_meta.description:
High-quality wok set including silicone handle covers, and a glass lid with a vent hole - Exclusive addition to your cookware collection 


 *  14” (36 cm) diameter cast iron wok with flat bottom diameter 6.3" (16 cm), a glass lid with a vent hole, 2 silicone hot handle holders. Used to sear, bake, broil, fry or grill in oven, on the stove, on the grill or over the campfire. 2 loop side handles for a steady, secure grip when lifting or transporting. Removable silicone hot handle holder which can stay on while cooking to avoid burning your hands by mistake. Silicone Hot Handle Grips protect your hands from -104 ºF to 464 ºF (-40°C to 240°C) Broil, bake, braise or roast in the oven up to 540°F (280℃). FREE Bonus cast iron cookbook (e-book sent via e-mail). MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We believe that you will love our Cast Iron Wok Set as much as we do, but in case you don’t we offer you 30 day, no questions asked, money back guarantee.



Click the "Add to Cart" button to get your Cast Iron Wok Set now!

Used to sear, bake, broil, fry or grill in oven, on the stove, on the grill or over the campfire.

2 loop side handles for a steady, secure grip when lifting or transporting. Removable silicone hot handle holder which can stay on while cooking to avoid burning your hands by mistake. Silicone Hot Handle Grips protect your hands from -104 ºF to 464 ºF (-40°C to 240°C)
Broil, bake, braise or roast in the oven up to 540°F (280℃). Nice gift box with instructions.

FREE Bonus cast iron cookbook (e-book sent via e-mail).
